section.p: This class contains all attributes - supporting as well as tracking of each one's cancellation or fulfillment - related to patient tasks (Care Management). Note that this class may not be supported by HDR but rather from other repository.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTaskCreated with data type Point In Time
This is the date and time the task was created.

Contains exactly one [1..1] taskSubjectDescription with data type String
This is the subject of the task.

Contains exactly one [1..1] taskPriority with data type Code
Priority for accomplishing this task. Possible values are LOW; MEDIUM; HIGH

Contains zero or one [0..1] taskDueDate with data type Point In Time
The date [and time] by which this task should be completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
The patient that this task applies to.

Contains zero or more [0..*] item, where its type is Linked Item
Item linked to this task.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
